last_episode_to_air.name: The Real Jesus of Compton
last_episode_to_air.overview: The gang talks Jesus into starring in a reality show after a sleazy producer promises them fame and fortune if they can get Jesus to agree; it's a disaster from start to finish, but Jesus is determined to get Pop's good word out as a result.

name: Black Jesus
overview: A TV series finds Jesus living in present day Compton, CA on a daily mission to spread love and kindness throughout the neighborhood with the help of his small but loyal group of downtrodden followers.

episodes.name: Smokin', Drinkin', and Chillin
episodes.overview: The gang talks Jesus into coming along on a drug buy financed by Boonie's mom.

episodes.name: Fish and the Con Man
episodes.overview: Vic vows to remove Jesus from the neighborhood, and hires Lloyd to be his “eyes and ears in the streets” and keep tabs on him. Meanwhile Jesus and the gang find the perfect lot for the garden, only to face instant extortion from local Mexican gangsters.

episodes.name: The S**t Heist
episodes.overview: After being extorted by Mexican gangsters, they are left with no money for fertilizer for their garden, so they must execute a manure heist at the Compton Boarding Stables.

episodes.name: I Gave at the Playground
episodes.overview: The gang end up agreeing to help Boonie with a yard sale. His ex girlfriend shows up though to cause havoc.

episodes.name: Fried Green Tomatoes
episodes.overview: The gang is ready to quit the garden when they find the weed in the garden has failed, but they discover an abundance of "miracle" green tomatoes.

episodes.name: Love Thy Enemy (1)
episodes.overview: The gang bottle and sell their green tomato sauce and Ms. Tudi makes peace with the CCSWC.

episodes.name: The Other Shoe Drops
episodes.overview: Travyon forays into documentary filmmaking and discovers a saboteur pouring bleach in the garden.

episodes.name: Love Thy Enemy (2)
episodes.overview: The complex is in shambles thanks to Vic and Lloyd.

episodes.name: Gangsta's Paradise
episodes.overview: Jesus decides to reunite with his friends from the "hood".

episodes.name: WTFWBJD
episodes.overview: While Jesus is on the run, the gang is left to ponder what would Black Jesus do in their shoes.

episodes.name: No Room for Jesus
episodes.overview: Jesus returns to Compton in search of a place to stay, but becomes concerned about Fish, who appears to be returning to a life of crime.

episodes.name: Jesus Gonna Get His
episodes.overview: Jesus and the gang take on the Church of Jesus Christ in Compton; they plan to teach its corrupt preacher a lesson.

episodes.name: False Witness
episodes.overview: When Vic misinterprets the gang's latest hustle as terrorist activity, he gears up to wage a one-man war against them.

episodes.name: Hands of God
episodes.overview: Jesus joins Ms. Tudi in her latest money-making scheme, a mobile spa van charging for Holy foot massages. The hustle puts Fish in an awkward position when Tudi soon decides it better to sell Fish's "gift of sexiness" instead.

episodes.name: Tasty Tudi's
episodes.overview: When Fish seduces a city worker into a no limit EBT card, he learns that free food can come at a high price

episodes.name: Taco Sundays
episodes.overview: Jesus loses his phone when the gang travel through Compton in a food truck.

episodes.name: Thy Neighbor's Strife
episodes.overview: Vic plunges into sin courtesy of Lloyd's estranged wife. Meanwhile, the gang shoots a music video for Boonie's latest track, "Side Bitches".

episodes.name: Janky Cable
episodes.overview: Trayvon's dad gets him free cable, which causes problems with Vic.

episodes.name: Lloyds Wife/Good for Nothing
episodes.overview: Lloyds' wife resurfaces announcing she wants a divorce. Vic is overjoyed, until things get messy. After a visit to the probation office, Fish faces a test of faith.

episodes.name: A Very Special Christmas In Compton
episodes.overview: Fed up with the commercialization of the holiday, Jesus makes a Christmas wish of his own. When it's granted, he's forced to face the unintended consequences of life without divinity.

episodes.name: The Compton Carter
episodes.overview: Jesus returns from jail to discover his running buddy Boonie has relocated from their old Compton Gardens apartment complex to the "new" Compton Gardens, where Lloyd is building manager.

episodes.name: Vatican Guys
episodes.overview: After discovering the leaked video of Jesus performing a miracle, the Vatican sends two secret agents from Italy to Compton to kidnap "the Black Jesus" and determine if the oversized black guy is really the son of God.

episodes.name: Parole Officer
episodes.overview: The parole officer for Jesus, a friendly white dude that just wants to make the world a better place, witnesses proof of Jesus' divinity, has a spiritual upheaval and decides to stop going to work and follow Jesus.

episodes.name: Operation SHUT'EMDOWN
episodes.overview: AmBro, the head of security at the New Compton Gardens, forms a militia to scare off drug dealers in the hood; in a show of force, his troops take over the street and screw up a drug deal the gang planned for that day.

episodes.name: Boonie Christ
episodes.overview: Jesus lets Boonie have the power of Christ so he can see how difficult being the Son of God really is; while Boonie tries to figure out how to make his new powers work for him, Jesus takes a skip day for himself.

episodes.name: The Compton Crusader
episodes.overview: When a vigilante in southwest Compton takes matters into his own hands, Jesus has to stop him before he goes too far.

episodes.name: Hair Tudi
episodes.overview: Ms. Tudi miraculously scores a small business loan and opens Tudi's Wigs, Weaves and Whatnots; the Korean Bitch Mafia isn't happy the store is on their turf, and that means war.

episodes.name: Boonie Comes Up
episodes.overview: Boonie thinks he has been possessed by the soul of a dead gangster and begins acting like a serious badass; Lloyd serves Jesus papers and takes him to "Homey's Court" for making him sober, and to settle up for $600.

episodes.name: God's Team
episodes.overview: Jesus becomes the coach for the Compton Devils junior high football team, but his agenda to spread love and kindness is at odds with the philosophy of winning at all costs, especially in the big game against the Simi Valley Skullcrushers.

episodes.name: The Real Jesus of Compton
episodes.overview: The gang talks Jesus into starring in a reality show after a sleazy producer promises them fame and fortune if they can get Jesus to agree; it's a disaster from start to finish, but Jesus is determined to get Pop's good word out as a result.
